name: Machu Picchu
description: Machu Picchu is one of the 7 wonders of the modern world. What is known about this citadel is still being discovered.

name: Sarakiniko
description: Sarakiniko Beach is a beach on Milos Island in the European country of Greece. It is located on the northern coast of the island. It is often compared to a lunar landscape

name: The Sahara
description: The Sahara or Sahara is the largest hot desert in the world and the third largest after Antarctica and the Arctic. With more than 9,400,000 kmÂ² of surface
